77194253ee065122d06a4a8fecbc35bd (08:55): Basically, POST /path HTTP/1.1
Host: host
Content-Length: length

Content here

c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (09:05): frames breakout: To have a page automatically break out of a frame, put this in the <head> of the document: <script type='text/javascript'>if(window!=top)top.location=document.location;</script>
